channel.title: holding company on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in holding company on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Exor Logo
Exor N.V. is a holding company incorporated in Netherlands and controlled by the Agnelli family through privately held company Giovanni Agnelli B.V. In 2021 it recorded revenues of more than $136 billion, with a Net Asset Value of around $32 billion, becoming the 37th largest group in the world by revenue, according to the 2021 Fortune Global 500 List. It has a history of investments running over a century, which currently include auto and truck manufacturers Stellantis, Ferrari and Iveco, agricultural and construction firm CNH Industrial, global reinsurer PartnerRe, the football team Juventus F.
You can download theExorlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Exor
item.description: Exor N.V. is a holding company incorporated in Netherlands and controlled by the Agnelli family through privately held company Giovanni Agnelli B.V. In 2021 it recorded revenues of more than $136 billion, with a Net Asset Value of around $32 billion, becoming the 37th largest group in the world by revenue, according to the 2021 Fortune Global 500 List. It has a history of investments running over a century, which currently include auto and truck manufacturers Stellantis, Ferrari and Iveco, agricultural and construction firm CNH Industrial, global reinsurer PartnerRe, the football team Juventus F.
